item.title: Slovensko+ (Slovakia Refresh) v1.5fix 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 30, 2025

Slovensko+ (Slovakia Refresh) v1.5fix 1.54 ETS2

Changelog 1.5fix
This upate fixes most of the game bugs/visual glitches:
Fixed Ruzomberok Invisible wall at the service station
Fixed AI Cars going through the company in Ruzomberok
Fixed floating persons in Cary
Fixed invisible walls in Cary
Fixed terrain gaps in Kuty
Fixed floating companies in Kuty
Fixed speed limit of 140kmh in Kolarovice
Updated E442 small part from Kolarovice through Czech Republic, to make a smoother transition between the map and the old assets.

Description:
This map reworks and refreshes the oldest parts of Slovakia. (almost all).

Version 1.0 includes:

Cities:
Lovinobaňa
Hrhov (definition only)
Kolárovice (definition only)
Banská Bystrica (very slight refresh)
Ružomberok
Čáry
Kúty

Roads:
Reworked I-66 (E77) (Zvolen – Hungarian Border)
Reworked entire I-16 (E58) (Zvolen – Lovinobana – Hrhov – Kosice)
Refreshed D1 highway (E50) – (Ružomberok – Kosice)
Reworked I-17 (Hungarian Border – Kosice)
Refreshed I-18 / I-21 (E371) (D1 motorway – Polish Border)
Refreshed R1 (E77) (Banska Bystrica – Ruzomberok)
Refreshed I-18 (E50) (Ruzomberok – Kolarovice)
Reworked Slovak E442 (Kolarovice – Czech Border)
Reworked from scratch I-51 / I-2 ( Trnava – Caty – Kuty – Czechia / Bratislava)

Credits: AndrewS

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: XP & Economy Rebalance v1.0 1.54 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 30, 2025

XP & Economy Rebalance v1.0 1.54 ATS

XP & Economy Rebalance fine-tunes the core gameplay systems of Euro Truck Simulator 2 and American Truck Simulator to create a smoother, more relaxed experience. This mod boosts progression speed, simplifies job access, and dramatically extends delivery deadlines—perfect for players who want to enjoy the journey without the pressure.

Forget racing the clock. With this mod, you can take your time and enjoy the road—delivering cargo is now stress-free.

Key Features:
Starting Bonus: Receive €150,000 when creating a new profile (one-time reward).
“Unlimited” Delivery Time: No more tight schedules—deliver at your own pace.
Massive XP Boost for Parking: Parking the trailer can skyrocket your level (e.g., Level 0 → Level 42).
Always Full Cargo Market: Say goodbye to empty cargo listings.
100% Truck Refund: Sell your trucks and get your full money back.
Fuel Discount: Fuel at your garage is 95% cheaper.
Online Truck Purchase: Buy trucks online anytime—no need to own one first.
No Abandonment Fines: Cancel jobs with zero penalty.
Emergency Fuel: Emergency refuel gives you 500 liters.
Smarter AI Drivers: Your hired drivers earn more and are more efficient.

Credits: Kass
